issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.summary: [Packaging][deb] Add support for Apache Arrow Datasets

comments.body: This software is pre-alpha. I'm not sure it is worth packaging for 0.14 (but it doesn't hurt)

I just want to suppress warnings in .deb build process.

I described this at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4655#issuecomment-504596042 .
